fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Furniture", "furniture",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Office Supplies", "office supplier",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Technology", "technology",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category]
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level CASE/IF logic to a calculated column using SWITCH(TRUE()) and mapped column references to 'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category]. Preserves fallback to the original Category value.
